name: Biotechspin
overview:
Biotechspin is THE professional network in the Biosciences (Biotech, Medtech, Pharma, Agrotech, Healthcare, Cosmetics, Medical, Cleantech) with over 18,000 companies registered.

But more importantly Biotechspin offers you free:

  • Effective means of connecting with your clients, collaborators, competitors, suppliers, employers, and partners in the 18,000 companies database with more than 2000 keywords.
  • A database of more than 19,000 scientific, marketing, and business studies, articles, protocols, and more.
  • Access to search 8 main publication and patent databases simultaneously, which consolidates your research efforts!
  • Gains in visibility and credibility in your sector
  • Employment and recruitment opportunities from our professional network

…and much more!

Visit www.biotechspin.com! It is free and always will be.
